_comment: Minecraft Java Edition Server Egg for Small Instances (2GB RAM)
name: Minecraft Java (Small Instance)
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: Minecraft Java Edition server optimized for small instances with limited RAM.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Minecraft Installation Script for Small Instances
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${SERVER_JARFILE}" == "server.jar" ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading ${MINECRAFT_VERSION} server jar"
    
    if [ "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -sSL https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq .latest.release | sed 's/"//g')
    else
        DOWNLOAD_URL=${MINECRAFT_VERSION}
    fi
    
    VERSION_DATA=$(curl -sSL https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq --arg VERSION "$DOWNLOAD_URL" '.versions[] | select(.id==$VERSION)')
    VERSION_URL=$(echo $VERSION_DATA | jq .url | sed 's/"//g')
    SERVER_URL=$(curl -sSL $VERSION_URL | jq .downloads.server.url | sed 's/"//g')
    
    curl -sSL $SERVER_URL -o server.jar
else
    echo -e "Using custom jar: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
fi

# Create optimized server.properties for small instances
echo -e "Creating optimized server.properties"
cat > server.properties << EOF
#Minecraft server properties (optimized for small instances)
broadcast-console-to-ops=true
broadcast-rcon-to-ops=true
debug=false
difficulty=easy
enable-command-block=false
enable-jmx-monitoring=false
enable-query=false
enable-rcon=false
enable-status=true
enforce-secure-profile=true
enforce-whitelist=false
entity-broadcast-range-percentage=100
force-gamemode=false
function-permission-level=2
gamemode=survival
generate-structures=true
generator-settings={}
hardcore=false
hide-online-players=false
initial-disabled-packs=
initial-enabled-packs=vanilla
level-name=world
level-seed=
level-type=minecraft\:normal
max-chained-neighbor-updates=1000000
max-players=5
max-tick-time=60000
max-world-size=5000
motd=A Minecraft Server
network-compression-threshold=256
online-mode=true
op-permission-level=4
player-idle-timeout=0
prevent-proxy-connections=false
pvp=true
query.port=25565
rate-limit=0
rcon.password=
rcon.port=25575
resource-pack=
resource-pack-prompt=
resource-pack-sha1=
require-resource-pack=false
server-ip=
server-port=25565
simulation-distance=6
spawn-animals=true
spawn-monsters=true
spawn-npcs=true
spawn-protection=16
sync-chunk-writes=true
text-filtering-config=
use-native-transport=true
view-distance=6
white-list=false
EOF

echo -e "\nInstallation completed"
